description:
Zoople HTML Editor for WinForms is a fully customisable HTML editor for C# and VB WinForms projects (and WPF via the WindowsFormsHost element). Simple to use, easy to implement, and with a familiarly styled word-processing interface the control is extensible and highly versatile.

      The HTML Editor .NET for Winforms allows end-users to create HTML segments for web pages, email templates and email composition, or any other purpose that requires HTML content.

      Sample projects are available from https://zoople.tech/download/MailMerge.zip?s=1.

      Online documentation is available at https://zoople.tech/download/HTML%20Editor%20for%20Winforms%20Reference%20Guide.pdf?s=1.

      Please direct any support requests to info@zoople.tech, we would be happy to hear from you.
releaseNotes:
Fixed - img CSS class name not persisted when editing image properties via image properties form
      Fixed - Border-collapse property for table defaults to separate - to enable easier resizing of tables with mouse (can be overridden with CSS)
      Fixed - Improvments to MS Word markup removal when pasting
      NEW - SetDirty(boolean ForceUpdate) method - sets the content dirty flag to true (ForceUpdate = true - forces an immediate refresh on databinding sources)
      Fixed - Main Toolbar resize hiding portion of mouseover background
      Fixed - Empty inline elements deleted when deleting selection
      Fixed - "Shift Arrow" key combination in CodeView not selecting additional characters
      Fixed - An issue where mailto address were not being added to hyperlinks in some cases
title: Zoople HTML Editor for WinForms
